title: Did Barack Obama express opposition to "undiscovered, undocumented and unverified immigration "?
subtitle: A 13-year-old quote from former Senator Illinois was reinserted into the public debate in the context of President Donald Trump's "Intolerance" policy.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2005, Senator Barack Obama expressed opposition to "undiscovered, undocumented and unrestricted immigration."
